did.unittitle: Jerry Hofman Collection of Union Certificates and Cards, 1927-1935
did.physdesc: Union cards, business cards, union membership certificates.
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Membership certicate and working card from the Amalamated Association of Street and Electric Railway Employes, Division 241, Chicago, IL. Business card from the United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners, Local 1089, Phoenix, AZ.

bioghist.p: Jerry Hofman was a proud union man all his working life. Early in his career he was a member of the Amalamated Association of Street and Electric Railway Employes of America, Division 241, in Chicago, IL. Later he was the Financial Secretary for the United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America, Local 1089, in Phoenix, AZ.

controlaccess.corpname: United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners of America, Local 1089
Amalgamated Association of Street and Electric Railway Employes of America, Division 241

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

prefercite.p: Jerry Hofman Collection of Union Certificates and Cards #6415m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5112: International Railway Company and the Amalgamated Association of Street, Electric Railway and Motor Coach Employees of America, Local 1342 and 1386 Arbitration Files 5159m: Amalgamated Association of Street and Electric Railway Employees of America Certificate of Membership for Clarence Wheeler 5718: Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners Documents 5718 mf: Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners Documents on Microfilm

scopecontent.p: From Amalgamated Association of Street and Electric Railway Employes, Division 241, for $10. Dated December 22, 1927.
From Amalgamated Association of Street and Electric Railway Employes, Division 241. Dated March 1, 1928. Includes cover.
From Amalgamated Association of Street and Electric Railway Employes, Division 241. Dated February 1935.
From United Brotherhood of Carpenters and Joiners, Local 1089.
